alert.note: Alert for Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 7:47PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Live Oak County through 815 PM CDT... At 747 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dinero, or 9 miles southeast of George West, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Lucas, Dinero, Lagarto, Argenta and Pernitas Point. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 40 and 52. US Highway 281 between mile markers 638 and 650. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
